name: Passage To Pluto
description:
This is a solo game I made for the Game Off 2020 game jam as my second game jam.

How To Play:

  • Quickly complete the tasks so the ship doesn't blow up
  • First you will fly to the Moon, then Mars, and finally Pluto
  • If you don't complete the task in time you will die
  • An indicator next to the task will light up letting you know you have to do it.
  • How to complete the tasks
    • Word Task
      • Type out the word shown in the above box
      • To restart the word, either fill out every box or press enter
    • Shift Task
      • Press the shift key repeatedly until the bar is full.
      • It will decay quickly so make sure to do it fast
      • Use shift keys if you'd like
    • Scroll Task
      • Put your mouse over the right box and scroll up or down to the goal number which is written on the left box
    • Sequence Task
      • Click the boxes below in the order that the boxes above flash
    • Crack Task
      • When a crack appears on the window, click on it to repair it until it's gone.
    • Wheel Task
      • Turn the wheel clockwise or counter clockwise to line up the green line with the middle
  • When the timer runs out and no tasks are active, you will move on to the next level

Please let me know of any bugs you find besides the visual ones.

Note: The pause and sound buttons don't work
